transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Hello? Namaskar sir, Abhishek baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se.
Executive: Haan boliye sir.
Customer: Haan ji ji aapka call aaya tha na parso din office hamara close tha.
Executive: Haan vahi sir wo refund nahi hua tha isliye abhi tak kya status ho gaya wo puchne ke liye phone kiya tha.
Customer: Haan wo aapka case matlab escalate ho gaya hai refund escalate ho gaya hai wo aapko dusre teen din me aapko credit ho jayega na aapke account me.
Executive: Okay okay sir, theek hai.
Customer: Haan ji baki aapko call to aaya hoga IndiaMART se.
Executive: Nahi abhi tak nahi aaya isliye mai phone kiya.
Executive: Accha baki aapko baki mai aapko ek mail
Customer: Starting me phone kiya tha Juhi madam ne unhone se wo manager ko contact kiya tha aise wo last hai ab wo 15 din ho gaya baat karke.
Executive: Accha haan wo pura verification vagaira karte hai na ki client ko kya problem thi.
Customer: Okay.
Executive: Wo pura verification karne ke baad fir aage process continue hota hai na upar se back end se.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Thoda time lag jata hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: To baki aapko aa jayega do se teen din me.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai sir.
Executive: Theek hai baki aapko abhi ek mail aayega mail ya whatsapp pe aayega usme matlab usko satisfied kar dena aage process continue ho jayega fir theek hai.
Customer: Haan theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai theek hai theek hai okay baki iske alawa aur koi dikkat aa rahi hai aapko?
Customer: Nahi sir wo kuch nahi wo mujhe wo enquiries accha nahi aa raha hai leads nahi aa raha hai na.
Executive: Accha.
Customer: Related nahi aa raha hai abhi tak nahi aa raha hai wo.
Executive: Accha abhi tak bhi nahi aa raha.
Customer: Nahi nahi nahi nahi aap hi dekh lijiye mera account.
Executive: Chaliye theek hai mai dekhta hu.
Customer: Theek hai sir okay.
Executive: Jaldi refund kar dijiye sir bas thanks.
Customer: Theek hai ho jayega.
Executive: Okay sir thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Refund not yet received.

- Not receiving good quality buyleads.



Resolution:

- Refund has been escalated, will be credited soon.

- Executive will check the customer's account.

- Customer needs to satisfy the mail for process continuation.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, buyleads, account, verification
